question: you are looking for part-time work. Write a letter to an employment agency. In your letter introduce yourself say what skills and work experience you have explain the sort of job you are looking for You should write at least 150 words.
text: I am Haniye and I am writing this letter to express my desire to get a part-time job with your agency’s assistance. I got my bachelor's degree in computer engineering in 2021 and enrolled for the master's degree in artificial intelligence this year.one of my friends suggested your agency since you have a great database of open positions around the country.

Primarily, I have 2 years’ job experience at a startup company as a web designer. I have joined them as a trainee and became a full-time front-end developer employer and have designed several commercial websites. Additionally, I have taken up various coding classes and I am able to fluently code in c++, c#, html5, CSS, Junit, etc.

As I am looking forward to shifting my career path to a more professional point. I am planning to attend a new company as a trainee for back-end development to ladder me up to being a full-stack developer in future. Since I am joining new courses to utilize my back-end programming skills, I can attend a part-time job at the time.
Attached you can find my resume. Could you please take a look at my cv and inform me about vacancies which match my qualifications?
I am looking forward to hearing from you.
